name: SDLash3D
body:
## Welcome to SDLash3D home page.

Who we are? We are a just random people that loves games, crowbars, crossplatform apps and so on. 

## Our projects

### [Xash3D SDL](https://sdlash3d.github.io/xash3d)
Xash3D engine that ported to SDL. Works even on your phone!
[![Xash3D Android](http://button.moddb.com/rating/medium/games/45401.png)](http://www.moddb.com/games/xash3d-android)

### [SDLash HLSDK](https://github.com/SDLash3D/halflife) and [SDLash SoHL](https://github.com/SDLash3D/SpiritOfHalfLife)
HLSDKs that ported to Android and ARM.

### [NanoGL](https://github.com/SDLash3D/nanogl)
Super fast OpenGL-to-OpenGLES translator.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
